    • Constructor Detail

      • DetailWindow

        public DetailWindow(WindowLocationManager locationManager,
                    FavouritesUpdatedListener listener,
                    Favourites allStations)
        Create a new window, in which a chart with the most recent temperatures is displayed, both as a chart, and in a table. View is modelled in tabs.
        Parameters:
        locationManager - saves previous window location, opens window to last location
        listener - an interface for updating the allStations list instantly both on screen, and in program
        allStations - the current working list of allStations

    • Method Detail

      • display

        public void display(WeatherStation station,
                    java.util.concurrent.FutureTask<java.util.List<WeatherObservation>> dataSupplier)
        The method that deals with the Java Swing context. All containers are cleared and populated with fresh data.
        Parameters:
        station - The WeatherStation for which data is displayed
        dataSupplier - An asynchronous way of retireiving the WeatherObservation data, via threading.

      • buildTable

        private javax.swing.JTable buildTable(java.util.List<WeatherObservation> observations)
        Takes the WeatherObservation object, and creates and populates a JTable with the most recent data.
        Parameters:
        observations - The iterable list of weather observations.
        Returns:
        the populated table, which is added to the appropriate JPanel.

      • buildRefreshButton

        private javax.swing.JButton buildRefreshButton(WeatherStation station)
        Create button to check if the current data is the most recent available.
        Parameters:
        station - the WeatherStation object, provides handle on object.
        Returns:
        button which is then added to the correct JPanel

      • updateChart

        private void updateChart(org.jfree.chart.JFreeChart chart)
        Checks if chart has been initialised. Avoids Null Pointer Exceptions.
        Parameters:
        chart - the chart object, used for graphically displaying the data

      • setChartPanelAttributes

        private void setChartPanelAttributes(org.jfree.chart.ChartPanel chartPanel)
        Method of disabling non-applicable functions from JFreeChart.
        Parameters:
        chartPanel - the chart equivalent of a JPanel, for use with JFrame.

      • buildDetails

        private javax.swing.JPanel buildDetails(WeatherObservation observation)
        Method of taking the most recent observations, and adding them to the returned JPanel
        Parameters:
        observation - the most recent observation.
        Returns:
        New JPanel, added to DetailedWindow.

      • buildFavouritesButton

        private javax.swing.JButton buildFavouritesButton(WeatherStation station,
                                                  Favourites allStations)
        Method to create the button to add or remove from the allStations list. Dynamically creates the label for the button depending on the stations existence in the allStations list.
        Parameters:
        station - handle on the station object being operated on
        allStations - the current working allStations list.
        Returns:
        new JButton to add or remove from allStations.

      • toggleFavourites

        private void toggleFavourites(WeatherStation station,
                              javax.swing.JButton button,
                              Favourites allStations)
        Method for toggling the allStations button between either Adding to Favourites, or Removing from Favourites. Makes us of the FavouritesUpdatedListener to dynamically update the allStations list in the Main Window
        Parameters:
        station - handle on the station object being operated on.
        button - handle on the favourite button
        allStations - the current allStations list.
